traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The conshee’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells, requiring no material components. * At will: detect evil and good, light * 1/day each: faerie fire, silent image

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
